html: We must answer the president’s call to put aside the partisanship and come together to work for the common good of our nation – just as we did in the 115th Congress (2017-2018), when we passed over 400 bills that were signed by @POTUS, 99% of which were bipartisan.

html: Jan. 1, 1942 - Martin Ruby, @TAMU Class of '42, is sworn in to the military at halftime of the @CottonBowlGame...less than one month after Pearl Harbor. He was named MVP of the game and went on to attain the rank of captain in the Army Air Force. #VeteransDay #GigEmpic.twitter.com/pLPpkopjd3
text:
Jan. 1, 1942 - Martin Ruby, @TAMU Class of '42, is sworn in to the military at halftime of the @CottonBowlGame...less than one month after Pearl Harbor. 

He was named MVP of the game and went on to attain the rank of captain in the Army Air Force.

#VeteransDay  #GigEmpic.twitter.com/pLPpkopjd3
